name: Lackluster Video
description:
HELP BUSTER KEEP HIS JOB BY SORTING RETURNED VHS TAPES AND STOCKING THEM BACK ONTO THE SHELVES.

GRAB TAPES FROM THE RETURN BOX AND SORT THEM INTO THEIR CORRECT BIN. ONCE SORTED, WALK TO THE SHELVES TO RETURN TAPES.

MOVE: W/A/S/D
GRAB / RETURN TAPES: SPACEBAR
PAUSE: P
FULLSCREEN: SHIFT
Controller Supported.
